name: Tab
description: Tab navigation component with React and Svelte support

props.name: items
props.description: Tab items array with key and label. TabItem: { key: string, label: string, disabled?: boolean }

props.name: onChange/onchange
props.description: Tab change callback. React: onChange, Svelte: onchange (lowercase)

examples.title: Svelte Basic
examples.code:
<script>
  import { Tab, type TabItem } from 'podo-ui/svelte';
  let activeTab = $state('overview');
  const items: TabItem[] = [
    { key: 'overview', label: 'Overview' },
    { key: 'details', label: 'Details' }
  ];
</script>
<Tab items={items} activeKey={activeTab} onchange={(key) => activeTab = key} />

examples.title: Svelte with TabPanel
examples.code:
<script>
  import { Tab, TabPanel, type TabItem } from 'podo-ui/svelte';
  let activeTab = $state('tab1');
  const items: TabItem[] = [
    { key: 'tab1', label: 'Tab 1' },
    { key: 'tab2', label: 'Tab 2' }
  ];
</script>
<Tab items={items} activeKey={activeTab} onchange={(key) => activeTab = key} />
<TabPanel tabKey="tab1" {activeTab}>Content 1</TabPanel>
<TabPanel tabKey="tab2" {activeTab}>Content 2</TabPanel>

examples.title: React Basic
examples.code: <Tab items={[{ key: 'overview', label: 'Overview' }, { key: 'details', label: 'Details' }]} defaultActiveKey="overview" onChange={(key) => console.log(key)} />

examples.title: React with Panels
examples.code:
<Tab items={items} activeKey={activeKey} onChange={setActiveKey}>

</Tab>
